name: Blood Pixels Scissors
description:
This is a little game developed during a Jam by myself and three friends, It's a 2D RockPaperScissors game to play alone or with someone else.

A controller is strongly suggested (two players can use one joystick each).

We hope you enjoy it!

Credits: 

Daniel Vidal Terrades (myself); Game Design and Programming.

Angel Martinez Moreno; Animation and Stage Design.

Pedro Lopez Garcia; Animation and Character Design.

Adrian Coll de Souza (aka Who Came After); Audio Effects and Soundtrack.
